author: taylor
msg: here are some examples of using JSF
two portlets to look at under the Administrative Folder:
- Profiler Admin demonstrates a Tree View
- JSF Prototype demonstrates a Datatable, PanelGroups and PanelTabbedPanes
(Im going to replace the Profiler Admin demo with a real portlet to administer the profiler soon)

author: taylor
msg: The JSF Bridge now  retains internal JSF nav state amongst views even when you navigate via jetspeed to other pages or tabs and back
The Tree View, Data View, and Panel components all seem to be keeping state correctly now

author: taylor
msg: finally the tree jsf demo is functional
it should retain internal JSF nav state amongst views even when you navigate via jetspeed to other pages or tabs and back
